akn:content.akn:p:
§ 12313. Information programs The Attorney General shall compile information regarding sex offender treatment programs and ensure that information regarding community treatment programs in the community into which a convicted sex offender is released is made available to each person serving a sentence of imprisonment in a Federal penal or correctional institution for a commission of an offense under chapter 109A of title 18 or for the commission of a similar offense, including halfway houses and psychiatric institutions. (Pub. L. 103–322, title IV, § 40154, Sept. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 1922.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was formerly classified to section 13943 of Title 42, The Public Health and Welfare, prior to editorial reclassification and renumbering as this section.
